text: Niederwil was a municipality in the district of Lebern in the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland. In 2011, Niederwil merged into Riedholz.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz. Swiss Federal Statistical Office. Accessed 18 February 2011. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Solothurn
title: Niederwil, Solothurn
